Question
========

The mean IQ score in the general population is 100, the standard deviation is 15. Calculate the $99^{ste}$ percentile of IQ scores, in other words, calculate the IQ score for which 99% of the scores are lower (and 1% higher). Hint: determine the z-score first. 
Answerlist
----------
* 115.00
* 129.40
* 134.95
* 138.55

Solution

* Incorrect
